info.name: Snow Leopard bookmarks toolbar
info.description:
This style changes the bookmarks toolbar to closely mimic the look of the dock menus in Mac OS X Snow Leopard.

Because the toolbar floats on the page, it hides by default. A few tweaks in the code can change this.

Complete the Snow Leopard series with these styles:
style 20883
style 21763
style 24273
style 21832
style 24724
style 28658
style 45720
info.additionalInfo:
*** UPDATES ***

07-20-11: Updated style for better compatibility with the theme, FXChrome.
04-02-11: Move toolbar down, and added a slower fade-out animation.
04-02-11: Increased offset height of toolbar to minimize overlapping toolbars.
03-31-11: The toolbar now shows automatically while customizing the toolbar.
